About Me

BIO

As a Software Developer at the HORIZON, I specialize in designing and delivering secure, scalable, and high-performance enterprise solutions that drive organizational efficiency and innovation. With over 5 of experience in .NET technologies, I combine technical expertise with strategic thinking to create impactful systems tailored to complex business needs.

Technical Skills :

  • Front-end: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular
  • Databases: SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB
  • Cloud & DevOps: Azure, AWS, Docker
  • Tools & Version Control: Git, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, Jira

Professional Experience :

Full Stack Developer

The (Munjaz) system works to convert all paper transactions into electronic ones. To contribute to accelerating work in the General Directorate of Prisons, data governance, raising the level of digital transformation, and achieving the concept of spending efficiency.
